description.zh-CN: 当代粗野主义风格，采用高对比、粗体边框和鲜艳霓虹色。融合数位原始性、当代大胆风格和视觉冲击。大胆原始设计风格采用高对比、粗边框和活跃霓虹色彩。融合数字粗野和当代大胆。
description.en-US: Bold, raw design style with high contrast, thick borders, and vibrant neon colors Combines digital brutalism's harsh aesthetics with contemporary neon and saturated colors creating powerful visual statements for bold, contemporary digital aesthetics Creates bold, high-contrast digital environments Perfect for contemporary brands, experimental applications, and statements-making design This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. digital rawness and contemporary boldness. Excellence in design.
